summary: The Stillbirth Health Improvement and Education for Autumn Act of 2025 (SHINE for Autumn Act of 2025) aims to improve research and data collection on stillbirths. It authorizes grants to states for surveillance, data collection (including risk factors), and building public health capacity. It also directs the Secretary to issue guidelines on data collection from healthcare providers and develop educational awareness materials. It authorizes appropriations for these activities for fiscal years 2026-2030.
